techmeme.title: In its annual report, Microsoft lists OpenAI as a competitor for the first time in AI offerings and in search and news advertising (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
A UK court sides with Intel in a patent dispute brought by R2 Semiconductor; R2 has filled similar suits against Intel in Germany, France, and Italy (Tobias Mann/The Register)
A Montenegro appeals court upholds a ruling to hand over Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon to South Korea, rejecting a bid to extradite him to the US (Associated Press)
The Twitter for Mac app appears to have been delisted from the App Store; some users say their X accounts were suspended after using the X for iPad app on macOS (Zac Hall/9to5Mac)
The US releases Russian cybercriminals Roman Seleznev and Vladislav Klyushin as part of a prisoner swap that freed 16 people from Russia (CyberScoop)
